text.tspan: GDP per capita from the World Bank vs. GDP per capita from the
Both sets of data are adjusted for inflation and price differences across countries and are measured in international-$ in 2011
Data source: World Bank, Maddison Project Database 2020 (Bolt and van Zanden, 2020)
